title: Modern Dashboard Layout
subTitle: An intuitive layout for dashboards

businessQuestions.title: What makes this layout unique?

businessQuestions.title: How can this layout improve user engagement?
businessQuestions.description: The responsive design ensures optimal viewing experiences across all devices.

title: Revenue KPI
subTitle: Tracking revenue trends
description: A comprehensive KPI for monitoring and analyzing revenue fluctuations.

businessQuestions.title: What is the revenue trend this month?
businessQuestions.description: The KPI provides insights into revenue changes compared to previous months.

businessQuestions.title: How does this year's revenue compare to last year?
businessQuestions.description: Analyze the yearly revenue growth using this KPI.

calculations.Total Profit: Calculated as total revenue minus total expenses for the month.
calculations.Total Profit (Last Month): Derived from the revenue and expense data for the previous month.
calculations.Total Profit (Last Year): Summation of monthly profits from the previous year.

businessQuestions.title: Is the layout mobile-friendly?
businessQuestions.description: Yes, the responsive design ensures compatibility with all devices.

title: Customer Retention KPI
subTitle: Monitor returning customer rates
description: A key performance indicator to measure the percentage of customers returning after their first purchase.

businessQuestions.title: What is the current retention rate?
businessQuestions.description: The KPI provides a detailed breakdown of retention trends.

businessQuestions.title: How can retention be improved?
businessQuestions.description: Analyze customer behavior and identify opportunities for improvement.

calculations.New Customers: Count of customers making their first purchase.
calculations.Returning Customers: Count of customers making repeat purchases.
